"Grind Limit Break":
"Each item has a maximum Grind Value.
However, you can use the Item Lab's \"Limit Break\" function to raise that maximum.

Performing a Limit Break consumes Gathering Materials and N-Meseta."

"To Limit Break items, you need material items such as Monotite, Dualomite, Trinite, Pentrite and Arms Refiners.

For information on how to obtain Arms Refiners, please consult the entry for Arms Refiners.""
